item.title: resource-quota
item.description: Resource Quota Resource Quota is used to limit resources in a namespace. It can be defined used resource yaml file. apiVersion: v1 kind: ResourceQuota metadata: name: compute-resources namespace: dev spec: hard: pods: "10" requests.cpu: "2" requests.memory: 2Gi limits.cpu: "2" limits.memory: 10Gi We need to specify resources in pod definition file if some resource quota is present in a namespace and is being use by pod.

item.title: namespace
item.description: Namespace A namespace is a mechanism to isolate a group of resources in kubernetes. It defines resource quotas, policies etc that apply on the pods and other resources being created in that namespace.
